entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `RuntimeInformation.OSDescription` is really `KernelDescription` #83287
  • Make it possible to systematically disable console output. #83283
  • [wasm] Review `FROZEN_CACHE` setting in the build targets #83281
    8.0.0
  • Obsolete JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext #83280
    8.0.0
  • Add an AppContext switch that disables using reflection by default in JsonSerializerOptions #83279
    8.0.0
  • Suboptimal codegen for memset/memcpy unrolling #83277
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ability to get modern Windows icons to System.Drawing.SystemIcons. #83276
  • [API Proposal]: Modify method for the ConcurrentDictionary<K,V> collection #83270
  • PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store fails with a PrincipalOperationException after any successful call to ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store #83269
  • [Blazor WASM] System.InvalidProgramException: Unable to run method 'void Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.Language.Legacy.ParserHelpers:.cctor ()': locals size too big. #83260
    8.0.0
  • Empty LdapException.ServerErrorMessage on Linux #83259
  • JIT: Investigate slow contexts in coreclr_tests #83258
  • Ildasm on Ubuntu does not output resource files #83254
  • [mono][jit] Consolidate Mono IR operations that deal with SIMD #83252
    Future
  • JIT fails to recognize when length is never negative for `Span<T>::.ctor(void*, int32)` #83248
  • Updated RID Plan #83246
  • [release/6.0] Doublelinklist GC failures on Mono #83245

Closed

  • [emsdk] TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #83278
  • DispatchProxy.Create reads AssemblyLoadContext.Name but treats it as an assembly name #80387
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializerOptions.GetTypeInfo throws when TypeInfoResolver is `null` #80529
    8.0.0
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Accurately log catastrophic test failures and freezes in source-gened test infrastructure #77735
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add IReadOnlySet2 for speeeding up set operations #83229
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryMarshal.CreateReadOnlySpan that takes `in` param #83191
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82464
    8.0.0
  • SourceLink info missing from unmanaged CLR PDBs #83184
  • [API Proposal]: TryUpdateOrRemove for the ConcurrentDictionary<K,V> collection #68742
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic Type Resolving Issue #77532
    Future
  • Crash in coreclr!ILCodeVersion::GetActiveNativeCodeVersion #79326
    8.0.0
  • Unexpected performance dropoff for MathF.Exp in loops with high iteration counts #83265
  • JIT: gtGetStructHandleIfPresent may return SIMD handles that normalize (via `impNormStructType`) to wrong types #83091
  • required and jsignore prevent correct serialization #83257
  • [mono][jit] Optimize loading constants from imm on arm64 #83199
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesnt look at the associated Property/Event when accessing methods #71985
    8.0.0
  • [REQ] Simplified way to consume async code anywhere with new methods on Task class #83113
  • [RyuJIT][ARM] Redundant overflow check in "C / X" #46010
    8.0.0
  • Zero-length cpblk or initblk should be removed #12807
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests crashing #83241
  • [JSImport] and Exceptions #81710
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Print the state when the align instructions don't match up #83286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename VirtualMethodTableManagedImplementation and add manual CCW to test generated RCW #83285
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Mono] Fix address data emitted in the MonoProfilerGCRoots ETW event #83284
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix the variable name #83282
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unify unroll limits in a single entry point #83274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83273
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Test out new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][mono] Disable DoublinkList/dlstack tests #83268
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug CI #83266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove the second copy of ILLink.Shared project and source code #83263
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Produce IL3000 and IL3001 from NativeAOT compiler #83253
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe container types optimizations. #83251
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Reduce duplicity in GVM analysis #83250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update emsdk #83244
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Prevent use of null when processing ALPN list #81797
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Fix PAX extended attribute reading logic to treat '=' character as valid in the value strings. #83177
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.5
  • [7.0] Add tar tests to confirm entries owned by deleted users can still be read or written. #83267
    test-enhancement, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.5
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • update alpine test images #82931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82934
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update the Roslyn version our ref-pack generators reference to 4.5.0 #83238
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName in DispatchProxy #82807
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.5
  • [wasm] Introduce jiterpreter control flow pass #83247
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add tar tests to confirm entries owned by deleted users can still be read or written #83126
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.16
  • Massively simplify getBaseJitTypeAndSizeOfSIMDType and the general SIMD handle caching/lookup #83228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] code cleanup #83210
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix path for packing #83017
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Optimized loading imm on arm64. #83204
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implements correct handling of RequiresAssemblyFiles on properties and events #83195
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Change logic around GC.Collect in objwriter #83249
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Add more win-arm64 entries in the net6 manifest #83237
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Flow emsdk using a stable package name instead of one that will break every preview #83208
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Overflow check optimizations for division #82924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow 0-sized block ops #83224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix missing branch target table update in jiterpreter #83236
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [workloads] Update the workload descriptions #83223
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Disable folding small-typed returned indirections #82846
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.16
  • [release/6.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82210
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 7.0.5
  • [browser] cold start benchmark with download throttling and latency #83220
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82805
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.5
  • [no merge] call mono_pmip_u in the crash handler #83219
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a primitive to split statements at a specified tree #83005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Optimize `x < 0` and `x >= 0` #83176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Testmerging jit64 #83151
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [workloads] Mark the windows runtime packs workload as abstract #83230
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2132695 #83240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • Another attempt to fix stress tests #83211
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Test merging baseservices/threading #83143
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82804
  • Change execution order conditions for intellisense swapping and copying msbuild targets. #83117
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Try to get more info about a named mutex creation failure #83186
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, Future
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [jiterp] Adjust jiterpreter thresholds to exercise it more on CI #82476
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [mono][jit] Adding more arm64 SIMD operations, SIMD codegen with instruction table. #83094
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [runtime/6.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83079
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [runtime/7.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83078
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • Revert "[wasm] Revert to using latest chrome for testing" #83234
